39  	/**
40  	 * @return the field or null if the field does not exist
41  	 */
42  	public static Field getField(final Class< ? > clazz, final String fieldName)
43  	{
44  		try
45  		{
46  			return clazz.getDeclaredField(fieldName);
47  		}
48  		catch (final NoSuchFieldException e)
49  		{
50  			return null;
51  		}
52  	}
53  
54  	/**
55  	 * @param setter
56  	 * @return Returns the corresponding field for a setter method. Returns null if the method is not a 
57  	 * JavaBean style setter or the field could not be located.
58  	 */
59  	public static Field getFieldForSetter(final Method setter)
60  	{
61  		if (!isSetter(setter)) return null;
62  
63  		final Class< ? >[] methodParameterTypes = setter.getParameterTypes();
64  		final String methodName = setter.getName();
65  		final Class< ? > clazz = setter.getDeclaringClass();
66  
67  		// calculate the corresponding field name based on the name of the setter method (e.g. method setName() => field
68  		// name)
69  		String fieldName = methodName.substring(3, 4).toLowerCase(Locale.getDefault());
70  		if (methodName.length() > 4)
71  		{
72  			fieldName += methodName.substring(4);
73  		}
74  
75  		Field field = null;
76  		try
77  		{
78  			field = clazz.getDeclaredField(fieldName);
79  
80  			// check if field and method parameter are of the same type
81  			if (!field.getType().equals(methodParameterTypes[0]))
82  			{
83  				LOG
84  						.warn(
85  								"Found field <{1}> in class <{2}>that matches setter <{3}> name, but mismatches parameter type.",
86  								fieldName, clazz.getName(), methodName);
87  				field = null;
88  			}
89  		}
90  		catch (final NoSuchFieldException e)
91  		{
92  			LOG.debug("Field not found", e);
93  		}
94  
95  		// if method parameter type is boolean then check if a field with name isXXX exists (e.g. method setEnabled() =>
96  		// field isEnabled)
97  		if (field == null
98  				&& (methodParameterTypes[0].equals(boolean.class) || methodParameterTypes[0].equals(Boolean.class)))
99  		{
100 			fieldName = "is" + methodName.substring(3);
101 
102 			try
103 			{
104 				field = clazz.getDeclaredField(fieldName);
105 
106 				// check if found field is of boolean or Boolean
107 				if (!field.getType().equals(boolean.class) && field.getType().equals(Boolean.class))
108 				{
109 					LOG
110 							.warn(
111 									"Found field <{1}> in class <{2}>that matches setter <{3}> name, but mismatches parameter type.",
112 									fieldName, clazz.getName(), methodName);
113 					field = null;
114 				}
115 			}
116 			catch (final NoSuchFieldException ex)
117 			{
118 				LOG.debug("Field not found", ex);
119 			}
120 		}
121 
122 		return field;
123 	}

125 	public static Field getFieldRecursive(final Class< ? > clazz, final String fieldName)
126 	{
127 		final Field f = getField(clazz, fieldName);
128 		if (f != null) return f;
129 
130 		final Class< ? > superclazz = clazz.getSuperclass();
131 		if (superclazz == null) return null;
132 
133 		return getFieldRecursive(superclazz, fieldName);
134 	}

136 	public static Object getFieldValue(final Field field, final Object obj) throws AccessingFieldValueFailedException
137 	{
138 		try
139 		{
140 			if (!field.isAccessible())
141 			{
142 				AccessController.doPrivileged(new SetAccessibleAction(field));
143 			}
144 			return field.get(obj);
145 		}
146 		catch (final Exception ex)
147 		{
148 			throw new AccessingFieldValueFailedException(field.getName(), obj, new FieldContext(field), ex);
149 		}
150 	}

152 	public static Method getGetter(final Class< ? > clazz, final String fieldName)
153 	{
154 		final String appendix = fieldName.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase(Locale.getDefault()) + fieldName.substring(1);
155 		try
156 		{
157 			return clazz.getDeclaredMethod("get" + appendix);
158 		}
159 		catch (final NoSuchMethodException ex)
160 		{
161 			LOG.trace("getXXX method not found.", ex);
162 		}
163 		try
164 		{
165 			return clazz.getDeclaredMethod("is" + appendix);
166 		}
167 		catch (final NoSuchMethodException e)
168 		{
169 			return null;
170 		}
171 	}

173 	public static Method getGetterRecursive(final Class< ? > clazz, final String fieldName)
174 	{
175 		final Method m = getGetter(clazz, fieldName);
176 		if (m != null) return m;
177 
178 		final Class< ? > superclazz = clazz.getSuperclass();
179 		if (superclazz == null) return null;
180 
181 		return getGetterRecursive(superclazz, fieldName);
182 	}

184 	public static List<Method> getInterfaceMethods(final Method method)
185 	{
186 		// static methods cannot be overridden
187 		if (isStatic(method)) return null;
188 
189 		final Class< ? >[] interfaces = method.getDeclaringClass().getInterfaces();
190 		if (interfaces.length == 0) return null;
191 
192 		final String methodName = method.getName();
193 		final Class< ? >[] parameterTypes = method.getParameterTypes();
194 
195 		final List<Method> methods = getCollectionFactory().createList(interfaces.length);
196 		for (final Class< ? > iface : interfaces)
197 		{
198 			final Method m = getMethod(iface, methodName, parameterTypes);
199 			if (m != null)
200 			{
201 				methods.add(m);
202 			}
203 		}
204 		return methods;
205 	}

207 	/**
208 	 * @return the method or null if the method does not exist
209 	 */
210 	public static Method getMethod(final Class< ? > clazz, final String methodName, final Class< ? >... parameterTypes)
211 	{
212 		try
213 		{
214 			return clazz.getDeclaredMethod(methodName, parameterTypes);
215 		}
216 		catch (final NoSuchMethodException e)
217 		{
218 			return null;
219 		}
220 	}

222 	/**
223 	 * @return the method or null if the method does not exist
224 	 */
225 	public static Method getMethodRecursive(final Class< ? > clazz, final String methodName,
226 			final Class< ? >... parameterTypes)
227 	{
228 		final Method m = getMethod(clazz, methodName, parameterTypes);
229 		if (m != null) return m;
230 
231 		final Class< ? > superclazz = clazz.getSuperclass();
232 		if (superclazz == null) return null;
233 
234 		return getMethodRecursive(superclazz, methodName, parameterTypes);
235 	}

237 	public static Method getSuperMethod(final Method method)
238 	{
239 		// static methods cannot be overridden
240 		if (isStatic(method)) return null;
241 
242 		final String methodName = method.getName();
243 		final Class< ? >[] parameterTypes = method.getParameterTypes();
244 
245 		Class< ? > currentClass = method.getDeclaringClass();
246 
247 		while (currentClass != null && currentClass != Object.class)
248 		{
249 			currentClass = currentClass.getSuperclass();
250 
251 			final Method m = getMethod(currentClass, methodName, parameterTypes);
252 			if (m != null && !isPrivate(m)) return m;
253 		}
254 		return null;
255 	}

257 	public static String guessFieldName(final Method getter)
258 	{
259 		String fieldName = getter.getName();
260 
261 		if (fieldName.startsWith("get") && fieldName.length() > 3)
262 		{
263 			fieldName = fieldName.substring(3);
264 			if (fieldName.length() == 1)
265 			{
266 				fieldName = fieldName.toLowerCase(Locale.getDefault());
267 			}
268 			else
269 			{
270 				fieldName = Character.toLowerCase(fieldName.charAt(0)) + fieldName.substring(1);
271 			}
272 		}
273 		else if (fieldName.startsWith("is") && fieldName.length() > 2)
274 		{
275 			fieldName = fieldName.substring(2);
276 			if (fieldName.length() == 1)
277 			{
278 				fieldName = fieldName.toLowerCase(Locale.getDefault());
279 			}
280 			else
281 			{
282 				fieldName = Character.toLowerCase(fieldName.charAt(0)) + fieldName.substring(1);
283 			}
284 		}
285 
286 		return fieldName;
287 	}

289 	public static boolean hasField(final Class< ? > clazz, final String fieldName)
290 	{
291 		return getField(clazz, fieldName) != null;
292 	}

294 	public static boolean hasMethod(final Class< ? > clazz, final String methodName, final Class< ? >... parameterTypes)
295 	{
296 		return getMethod(clazz, methodName, parameterTypes) != null;
297 	}

299 	/**
300 	 * 
301 	 * @param method the method to invoke
302 	 * @param obj the object on which to invoke the method
303 	 * @param args the method arguments
304 	 * @return the return value of the invoked method
305 	 * @throws InvokingMethodFailedException
306 	 */
307 	public static Object invokeMethod(final Method method, final Object obj, final Object... args)
308 			throws InvokingMethodFailedException, ConstraintsViolatedException
309 	{
310 		try
311 		{
312 			if (!method.isAccessible())
313 			{
314 				AccessController.doPrivileged(new SetAccessibleAction(method));
315 			}
316 			return method.invoke(obj, args);
317 		}
318 		catch (final Exception ex)
319 		{
320 			if (ex.getCause() instanceof ConstraintsViolatedException)
321 				throw (ConstraintsViolatedException) ex.getCause();
322 			throw new InvokingMethodFailedException("Executing method " + method.getName() + " failed.", obj,
323 					new MethodReturnValueContext(method), ex);
324 		}
325 	}

327 	public static boolean isClassPresent(final String className)
328 	{
329 		try
330 		{
331 			Class.forName(className);
332 			return true;
333 		}
334 		catch (final ClassNotFoundException e)
335 		{
336 			return false;
337 		}
338 	}

340 	public static boolean isFinal(final Member member)
341 	{
342 		return (member.getModifiers() & Modifier.FINAL) != 0;
343 	}

345 	/**
346 	 * determines if a method is a JavaBean style getter method
347 	 */
348 	public static boolean isGetter(final Method method)
349 	{
350 		return method.getParameterTypes().length == 0
351 				&& (method.getName().startsWith("is") || method.getName().startsWith("get"));
352 	}

354 	// public Constructor getDeclaredConstructorOfNonStaticInnerClass(Class)
355 	public static boolean isNonStaticInnerClass(final Class< ? > clazz)
356 	{
357 		return clazz.getName().indexOf('$') > -1 && (clazz.getModifiers() & Modifier.STATIC) == 0;
358 	}

360 	public static boolean isPackage(final Member member)
361 	{
362 		return (member.getModifiers() & (Modifier.PUBLIC | Modifier.PRIVATE | Modifier.PROTECTED)) == 0;
363 	}

365 	public static boolean isPrivate(final Member member)
366 	{
367 		return (member.getModifiers() & Modifier.PRIVATE) != 0;
368 	}
369 
370 	public static boolean isProtected(final Member member)
371 	{
372 		return (member.getModifiers() & Modifier.PROTECTED) != 0;
373 	}

375 	/**
376 	 * determines if a method is a JavaBean style setter method
377 	 */
378 	public static boolean isSetter(final Method method)
379 	{
380 		final Class< ? >[] methodParameterTypes = method.getParameterTypes();
381 
382 		// check if method has exactly one parameter
383 		if (methodParameterTypes.length != 1) return false;
384 
385 		final String methodName = method.getName();
386 		final int methodNameLen = methodName.length();
387 
388 		// check if the method's name starts with setXXX
389 		if (methodNameLen < 4 || !methodName.startsWith("set")) return false;
390 
391 		return true;
392 	}

394 	public static boolean isStatic(final Member member)
395 	{
396 		return (member.getModifiers() & Modifier.STATIC) != 0;
397 	}

399 	public static boolean isTransient(final Member member)
400 	{
401 		return (member.getModifiers() & Modifier.TRANSIENT) != 0;
402 	}

404 	/**
405 	 * determines if a method is a void method
406 	 */
407 	public static boolean isVoidMethod(final Method method)
408 	{
409 		return method.getReturnType() == void.class;
